name: SUB-Orbital
description:
Instructions: Click anywhere to start. Use mouse movement to aim. Please reload the page to restart (or the game over screen does not trigger).

It is the year 2122.

Planet Earth is under attack by a species of sentient 2-Dimensional beings called the Polycrons.

The SUB-Orbital Defence Perimeter has been compromised and the auto-targetting AI is offline. You must control it manually and make split second decisions to deflect the Polycrons before they strike the surface. Stay sharp to avoid deflecting them back towards the surface.

You are humanity's last hope.

Good luck.
